attributes.action: allow us to back out of this system governed by those who favour the corporate above the individual
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: find freedom your own way, but be it away from the nerfarious authority that works only for corporations, where the only goal is to achieve ultimate financial wealth. have we all to believe that money is everything? that sure is the picture our government paints for us.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
